note.p: Career: Augustinian abbate; Librarian, Bologna; Professor of Natural History, Padua University; travelled in Dalamtia (1770-1774); travels to investigate river sources funded by Frederick Augustus Hervey (FRS 1782)
Authority: Alternative birth date information received from Dr T R Shaw
Notes: Changed his Christian names. According to the Dizionario biografico degli Italiani, Romas 49 1997, pp205-210, he was born on 09 November 1741 or 10 November 1741
